item.title: Javap
item.dc:creator: @marluxia marluxia
item.description:
@marluxia wrote:

[quote=“nueb35, post:4, topic:265128”][quote author=frank_ link=topic=350030.msg2689985#msg2689985 date=1235909713]
theres a reason nobody has done it before
[/quote]

what is?[/quote]

Because there are no benefits of doing it this way (It was all a little joke to be honest ;D). Seeing as “javap” is included with JDK you might as well just use the internal bcel library and save yourself the hassle (same patterns anyways). However I hope people will start using the javap disassembler now ;))))).

io9:

hey hot stuff i hurd this on msn

hi2u2bru

item.title: Javap
item.dc:creator: @marluxia marluxia
item.description:
@marluxia wrote:

@echo off
title IO9'S FINE MOPARSCAPE UPDATER!!!!!! ALL DA WAY FROM MOPARSCAPE!!!!!!!!!!!!!
setlocal enabledelayedexpansion

if exist runescape.jar (
	if not exist bin mkdir bin
	cd bin
	jar xf ../runescape.jar
) else (
	echo please place "runescape.jar" in this directory!!
	goto end
)

for /f "tokens=1-5" %%A in ('javap -public -c client') do (

	if "%%A" == "public" set init=false
	if "%%D" == "init();" set init=true

	if !init! == true (
		if "%%B" == "sipush" (
			if not %%C == 765 if not %%C == 503 (
				echo client version is #%%C
				goto end
			)
		)
	)
	rem echo %%A %%B %%C %%D %%E
)

:end
pause

Read full topic
